gameDetails.name: Blue Moon City: Expansion Tile Sets 1 & 2
gameDetails.description:
These expansions to the base game are available in the Spielbox magazine "Der Knizia Almanach I" and 6/06.

They are also available as free download from the Fantasy Flight Blue Moon City support page.

The tiles are:

     Der Knizia Almanach:
         Hospital
         Meeting Hall
    
     Spielbox 6/2006:
         Theater
         Golden Shrine
